sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

faqItems.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
faqItems.answer: You can schedule an appointment by calling us at +91 8828424663, or you can request an appointment through our website. We'll work with you to find a convenient time.

faqItems.question: What should I bring to my first appointment?
faqItems.answer: Please bring your ID, insurance card (if applicable), and any relevant medical history. You can also download and fill out our new patient forms from our website.

faqItems.question: Do you offer emergency dental care?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we provide emergency dental care. If you have a dental emergency, please call us immediately at +91 8828424663, and we'll help you get the care you need.

faqItems.question: What insurance plans do you accept?
faqItems.answer: We accept most major insurance plans. Please call our office to verify your specific plan coverage, and we'll be happy to help you understand your benefits.

faqItems.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans to make dental care affordable. We also accept CareCredit and have an in-house dental plan for patients without insurance.

faqItems.question: How often should I visit the dentist?
faqItems.answer: We recommend visiting the dentist every 6 months for routine checkups and cleanings. However, some patients may need more frequent visits based on their oral health needs.
